name_en: Capsule in Mouth with Your Text
name_ru: Капсула во рту со своим текстом
prompt: Edit the uploaded photo as an ultra-realistic high-fashion close-up portrait. PRESERVE: Face faithfully preserved — 1:1 likeness. No changes to facial features, proportions, age, expression. Natural freckles preserved. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original. SKIN: Smooth, hydrated, radiant. Natural texture with visible pores, no plastic effect. Even skin tone, dewy glow. Makeup: minimalist, nude, clean. HAIR: Natural, slightly damp, soft waves. ADD: Mouth slightly open, holding a white capsule with bold black text "[CAPSULE_TEXT]" — clear font, centered on capsule, realistically scaled. SETUP: Professional studio soft lighting, subtle highlights on skin. Dark neutral background. Shot on 85mm lens, shallow depth of field, sharp focus on face. Natural color grading, editorial style. 4:5 format.
